description: Details required by condition 11 (Protection of trees during construction) of planning permission 24/06052 (Replace full width glazed sliding doors, windows and terrace to front of property with tiled mansard roof with two dormers; refurbishment and upgrade to front area and front elevation; replacement of all existing windows with double glazed, timber framed windows; lowering raised rear roof level; replacement rear glazed bay window with solid brick wall, with typical timber sash windows; alterations to rear addition, including replacement uPVC windows with timber sash windows; enlargement of existing lower ground floor and lowering garden to meet this level).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
